verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, What is the vine <S%H1612><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> more than any tree <S%H6086><s%>, or than a branch <S%H2156><s%> which is among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%>?

Shall wood <S%H6086><s%> be taken <S%H3947><s%> thereof to do <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%>? or will men take <S%H3947><s%> a pin <S%H3489><s%> of it to hang <S%H8518><s%> any vessel <S%H3627><s%> thereon?

Behold, it is cast <S%H5414><s%> into the fire <S%H784><s%> for fuel <S%H402><s%>; the fire <S%H784><s%> devoureth <S%H398><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> the ends <S%H7098><s%> of it, and the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it is burned <S%H2787><s%>. Is it meet <S%H6743><s%> for any work <S%H4399><s%>?

Behold, when it was whole <S%H8549><s%>, it was meet <S%H6213><s%> for no work <S%H4399><s%>: how much less shall it be meet <S%H6213><s%> yet for any work <S%H4399><s%>, when the fire <S%H784><s%> hath devoured <S%H398><s%> it, and it is burned <S%H2787><s%>?

Â¶ Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; As the vine <S%H1612><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%>, which I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the fire <S%H784><s%> for fuel <S%H402><s%>, so will I give <S%H5414><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against them; they shall go out <S%H3318><s%> from one fire <S%H784><s%>, and another fire <S%H784><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> them; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when I set <S%H7760><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against them.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>, because they have committed <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
